attributes.action: Make everyone pay for their own interpreting services and not the tax payer
attributes.additional_details:
Everyone who lives within the UK are currently allowed free interpreting services for Doctor’s or Hospital appointment etc
I have worked for an NHS interpreting service for 7 years and have noticed how much is spent on interpreting services every year in just one city, the figures are overwhelming.

I believe if you live in a foreign country that you should at least learn to speak the language but if you can’t be bothered then you should be solely responsible for your own interpreting costs
attributes.background: The British tax payer spends over £100 Million every year on interpreting services for people who can speak English, This money could be spent elsewhere on vital services like the NHS or Police force.
